Equipment.Name: DumbBells BenchPress ThreadMill MedicineBall YogaMatt TenisRacket TenisBalls GolfClubs

EquipmentDetails.Description: These dumb bells come in steel or in plastic full with water. They come in 10kg,20kg,30kg,40kg,50kg. Must not be used by anyone under 16.
The bench press comes with 2 steel poles which weigh 10kg each. The weights that come with this are 10kg,20kg,30kg,40kg,50kg. Must not be used by anyone under 18.

Whatver your level of fitness, the Everlast Everfit XV10 treadmill will help you to achieve results. From gentle walking to fast running, this compact and functional Bluetooth treadmill allows you to have the comfort and convienience of working out at home. The size is Size H135.5, W73, D165cm.Price 1329.99 euro.

The Physical Company medicine ball are a great way to incorporate resistance training into personal training sessions, home circuit classes and gym programmes with a complete range of weight options.Diameter 19cm price 31.99 euro.

The blue 4mm thick Yoga Mat from Reebok features a non-slip surface to help you maintain stability and posture through every pose. Measuring in at 173 x 61cm, the Reebok Yoga Mat is abrasion resistant and comfortable for your feet, knees and hands - not only that but it's easy to care for and a breeze to clean after use. Price 23.99 euro.

A superb entry level tennis racket, the Roger Federer 27in understands that everyone starts out new but need a superb quality racket to help build skills. A great value, great quality, lightweight construction ready to get you through your first few years of the game. Price 32.99 euro.
This pack of Head tennis balls is championship quality and suitable for all playing surfaces. The pack is ideal for getting some practise in or for some fast-paced matches. Price 6.49 euro.

Introduce yourself to the wonderful game of golf with the superb Wilson Reflex package set. This package set will benefit beginners as the clubs are designed to help golfers get the ball high in the air with great accuracy. With a quality bag to carry around the clubs you can not go wrong with this ultimate package set. Head covers included.Suitable for beginner players price 269.99 euro.

WomenDetails.Description: Can be used on grass or astro turf
